text: Cêā midị̂ mxng dū brrdā p̄hū̂ thī̀ dị̂ rạb s̄̀wn h̄nụ̀ng cāk khạmp̣hīr̒ dxk h̄rụ̄x doythī̀ phwk k̄heā ṣ̄rạthṭhā t̀x xạl ỵib ti læa xạt̩-t̩xḳhūt læa kl̀āw kæ̀ brrdā p̄hū̂ pt̩is̄eṭh ṣ̄rạthṭhā ẁā phwk k̄heā h̄el̀ā nī̂ h̄æla pĕn p̄hū̂ xyū̀ nı thāng thī̀ theī̀yngtrng kẁā brrdā p̄hū̂ ṣ̄rạthṭhā thậngh̄lāy
